I.ii.1.C.2.a
.
PMC Reporting Requirements
PMCs are required to provide Pension and Fiduciary Service with periodic reports and logs.  The table below describes which reports and logs are due and when they are due.
Report/Log
Frequency of Reporting
Reference
erroneous payments log
quarterly
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, 2.B
training compliance report
quarterly
M21-3, Part II, A.6.b
FTI internal inspections report
triannually
M21-1, Part XIV, 4.B.5
title: M21-1, Part I, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C - Pension Management Center (PMC) Procedures
citation: Part I, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C
